body: Because I had to reverse engineer this from toxcore's code, it's possible that I missed something. @irungentoo, please review this and let me know if anything is incorrect. [](https://reviewable.io/reviews/toktok/tox-spec/26)

comment_data.body:
MD024 Multiple headers with the same content

Please choose a different name or qualify it (or the existing one).
comment_data.diff_hunk:
@@ -3713,3 +3713,163 @@ that was stored and it is removed from the array.
 
 Ping array is used in many places in toxcore to efficiently keep track of sent
 packets.
+
+# State Format
+
+The reference Tox implementation uses a custom binary format to save the state
+of a Tox client between restarts. This format is far from perfect and will be
+replaced eventually. For the sake of maintaining compatibility down the road,
+it is documented here.
+
+The binary encoding of all integer types in the state format is a fixed-width
+byte sequence with the integer encoded in Little Endian.
+
+Length | Contents
+------ | --------
+`4`    | Zeroes
+`4`    | `uint32_t` (0x15ED1B1F)
+`?`    | List of sections
+
+## Sections
+
+The core of the state format consists of a list of sections. Every section has
+its type and length specified at the beginning. In some cases, a section only
+contains one item and thus takes up the entire length of the section. This is
+denoted with '?'.
+
+Length   | Contents
+-------- | --------
+`4`      | `uint32_t` Length of this section
+`2`      | `uint16_t` Section type
+`2`      | `uint16_t` (0x01CE)
+`?`      | Section
+
+Section types:
+
+Name          | Value
+------------- | -----
+NospamKeys    | 1
+DHT           | 2
+Friends       | 3
+Name          | 4
+StatusMessage | 5
+Status        | 6
+TcpRelays     | 10
+PathNodes     | 11
+EOF           | 255
+
+Not every section listed above is required to be present in order to restore
+from a state file. Only NospamKeys is required.
+
+### Nospam and Keys
+
+Length | Contents
+------ | --------
+`4`    | `uint32_t` Nospam
+`32`   | Long term public key
+`32`   | Long term secret key
+
+### DHT

comment_data.body:
MD024 Multiple headers with the same content

"Sections" exists twice in this document.
comment_data.diff_hunk:
@@ -3713,3 +3713,163 @@ that was stored and it is removed from the array.
 
 Ping array is used in many places in toxcore to efficiently keep track of sent
 packets.
+
+# State Format
+
+The reference Tox implementation uses a custom binary format to save the state
+of a Tox client between restarts. This format is far from perfect and will be
+replaced eventually. For the sake of maintaining compatibility down the road,
+it is documented here.
+
+The binary encoding of all integer types in the state format is a fixed-width
+byte sequence with the integer encoded in Little Endian.
+
+Length | Contents
+------ | --------
+`4`    | Zeroes
+`4`    | `uint32_t` (0x15ED1B1F)
+`?`    | List of sections
+
+## Sections
+
+The core of the state format consists of a list of sections. Every section has
+its type and length specified at the beginning. In some cases, a section only
+contains one item and thus takes up the entire length of the section. This is
+denoted with '?'.
+
+Length   | Contents
+-------- | --------
+`4`      | `uint32_t` Length of this section
+`2`      | `uint16_t` Section type
+`2`      | `uint16_t` (0x01CE)
+`?`      | Section
+
+Section types:
+
+Name          | Value
+------------- | -----
+NospamKeys    | 1
+DHT           | 2
+Friends       | 3
+Name          | 4
+StatusMessage | 5
+Status        | 6
+TcpRelays     | 10
+PathNodes     | 11
+EOF           | 255
+
+Not every section listed above is required to be present in order to restore
+from a state file. Only NospamKeys is required.
+
+### Nospam and Keys
+
+Length | Contents
+------ | --------
+`4`    | `uint32_t` Nospam
+`32`   | Long term public key
+`32`   | Long term secret key
+
+### DHT
+
+This section contains a list of DHT-related sections.
+
+Length   | Contents
+-------- | --------
+`4`      | `uint32_t` (0x159000D)
+`?`      | List of DHT sections
+
+#### Sections

[![CLA assistant check](https://cla-assistant.io/pull/badge/signed)](https://cla-assistant.io/TokTok/tox-spec?pullRequest=26)
All committers have accepted the CLA.

Patch applied and issues fixed. 
`make check` shouldn't fail anymore.

waiting for @irungentoo to review for correctness. --- Review status: 0 of 1 files reviewed at latest revision, 1 unresolved discussion. --- _Comments from the [review on Reviewable.io](https://reviewable.io:443/reviews/toktok/tox-spec/26#-:-KCKknKPMCcHId1mGJCZ:-1092339110)_

Review status: 0 of 1 files reviewed at latest revision, 2 unresolved discussions.

_[spec.md, line 3728 [r2]](https://reviewable.io:443/reviews/toktok/tox-spec/26#-KCKmcTiqUdM30PQz0xt:-KCKmcTiqUdM30PQz0xu:1873063320) ([raw file](https://github.com/toktok/tox-spec/blob/1d1de2a98dcbd7880d19d3099bd3ad837688b5d1/spec.md#L3728)):_
Can you change the table format like this:

``` diff
-|--------|-----------------------------------|
+|:-------|:----------------------------------|
```

My patch was slightly wrong. The canonical table format in the document is with `|:` as cell separator.

---

I.e. "list" sounds as if that field contained just some sort of list, rather than whole sections.
